title: Add SECURITY.md with responsible disclosure process
description:
Create SECURITY.md documenting:
- Security model (allow/deny/trust)
- Known security considerations (source_env_if_exists, plaintext state, trust subtree)
- Responsible disclosure process
- Contact information for security reports

This was recommended by the architect during v0.1.0 release review.

title: Document source_env_if_exists security bypass
description:
The source_env_if_exists stdlib function bypasses cascade's authorization system. This needs to be documented clearly in:
- README.md security section
- SECURITY.md (once created)
- stdlib.sh function comment

Security review identified this as medium-severity issue requiring documentation.

Consider adding a warning or authorization check in future versions.

title: cascade prints env vars after every command
description: cascade should only print its env var diff line after loading its .envrc chain, not after every single command.
close_reason: Fixed by adding EqualEffect() method that compares only Next maps for spam prevention

title: Add 'cascade doctor' command for troubleshooting
description:
Implement a diagnostic command to help users troubleshoot shell integration issues:

Checks:
- Shell hook installed correctly
- Bash version compatibility
- XDG directory permissions
- Config file syntax
- Cache directory state
- Common misconfigurations

Target: v0.2.0

Recommended by architect during v0.1.0 release review.
close_reason: Implemented doctor command with bash version, data dir, config, cache, shell hooks, and cascade root checks
